page.title: 08ST.MICHAEL'S MOUNT CASTLE-3
page.content: Lady and Lord St.Levan have their own path and entrance to their{private {apartments}in the castle. In the hall just inside their front door is a giant sun fish found off Lands End, which has a glass eye. In one of the guest bedrooms is a four poster bed which some people think is haunted because carved on the posts are the heads of Spanish soldiers who were drowned in a ship wreck. The curtains in the drawing room are usually kept drawn to protect the paintings from the bright light. Lord and Lady St. Levan also have their own {private garden}with many rare plants. These grow on the Mount because it has a mild climate.
